testcase.name: [P_16]To verify user is able to create new playlist by entering the valid input
testcase.system-out: When I click on the Playlist option from the Upper bar......................passed When I click on the New Playlist to Create new playlist.....................passed When I enter "Test" in the name field.......................................passed When I click on the Create new button.......................................passed Then I am able to successfully create the new playlist named "Test".........passed
